attributes.action: Remove the knighthood from Tony Blair
attributes.additional_details:
Tony Blair sent many to war, many died & veterans around the UK hold him responsible for a decision that lost lives.
This knighthood for him is an insult to veterans everywhere.
Allow the Great British public & veterans the right to decide.
attributes.background: Strip the knighthood from Tony Blair

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions that relate to honours and appointments, which includes calling for an honour to be removed.
